des:
50% of people stay with it!
Alexa's 4 unique tips to help you make it a habit.
Meditation skills that can be continued at your own pace and have been used for over 5,000 hours in total.


# 4 Secrets to Continuous Meditation
- You can start anytime, anywhere by simply saying, "Alexa, open Meditation Habits."
- You can incorporate it into your daily routine by using the standardized actions!
- You can specify a meditation time as short as 1 minute, so you can meditate at your own pace!
- You can keep motivated with history, levels, and rewards! 


# About functions
## Timer
You can set the timer for any time between 1 minute and 60 minutes to meditate.
You can start with a few minutes at first, and as you get used to it, you can increase the time to adjust the meditation time to your own pace.

## Record
Record your accumulated meditation time and your meditation level.
It notifies you when you have finished meditating.
When you speak the words "check history," a SkillCard is sent with your history for the last 7 days and your current meditation level.
You can view your SkillCard in the Alexa app under Activities.


# Benefits of Meditation
Meditation can help you relax, relieve stress, stabilize emotions, and increase concentration.
Studies have shown that 20 to 25 minutes a day for 8 weeks or more can produce definite results.

That said, we know it's not always easy to keep up.
Set up a routine action or reminder, and
Do it for just a few minutes every day, and make it a habit!


# About Sound
After starting the skill, you can change the sound by saying "Sound Settings".
- Nature Park
- Sea
- River
- Ranch
- Summer night
- No Sound 
- Random
- Fields of Meditation (10)
- Bamboo Forest
- Shiva (3)
- Nothingness (7)
- Morning Market (15)
- Awake My Soul (10)
- End of night (12)
- Flight of the Bird (12)
- Light (12)

() is the meditation level required to select.


# About level & experience
One of the most important aspects of meditation is continuity.
By doing it daily, even for a few minutes, the effects will accumulate.

If you meditate continuously (within a week), you will receive bonuses.
Get lots of experience and raise your meditation level!

# Subscription
For those who just can't continue, we also offer "Meditation Premium".
There is a free trial period for new registrations.
You can find more details in the "Help" section.
If you wish to cancel, you can stop at "Cancel Subscription".
*All sounds are available by subscription, and you will be able to view your past history indefinitely.

# Other
Support for devices with screens is also available.
Sounds can be easily selected and healing images are displayed.

If you're having a hard time alone, stick it out with your buddies!
